tools.name: Andriller
tools.description: Software utility with a collection of forensic tools for smartphones; performs read-only, non-destructive acquisition

tools.name: EML analyzer
tools.description: Analyze EML files: headers, bodies, attachments; extract IOCs; identify suspicious attachments

tools.name: ExifTool
tools.description: Library and CLI tool for reading, writing and editing metadata for a lot of file types

tools.name: extundelete
tools.description: Tool to recover deleted files from an ext3 or ext4 partition

tools.name: Fibratus
tools.description: Tool for exploration and tracing of the Windows kernel

tools.name: Foremost
tools.description: CLI tool to recover files based on their headers, footers, and internal data structures

tools.name: ForensicMiner
tools.description: DFIR automation for collecting and analyzing evidence

tools.name: FTK Imager
tools.description: Investigate electronic devices; full disk imaging capabilities: preview and image hard drives from Windows and Linux computers, CDs, DVDs, thumb drives, and other USB; forensic image mounting: mount an image for a read-only view that leverages file explorer; preview data; RAM capture

tools.name: Live Forensicator
tools.description: Assist forensic investigators and incidence responders in carrying out a quick live forensic investigation

tools.name: MVT
tools.description: Mobile Verification Toolkit; collection of utilities to simplify and automate the process of gathering forensic traces helpful to identify a potential compromise of Android and iOS devices

tools.name: rekall (Fireeye fork)
tools.description: Fork of rekall with support for Windows 10 memory compression

tools.name: ResourcesExtract
tools.description: Scans dll/ocx/exe files and extract all resources found, Windows only

tools.name: volatility (Fireeye fork)
tools.description: Fork of volatility with support for Windows 10 memory compression
